author: Jacqueline Howard
title: A fulfilling social life in a global pandemic? There's an app for that
description: While some social media might leave you feeling hollow, these apps can help facilitate some genuine quality time while we all stay home.
content:
Posted 
March 30, 2020 04:00:52
The realisation that we are living through a major global event has put many of us into a spin, and thrown our lives askew. 
A third of the world is now under government-enforced lockdown, and many more are choosing to do th… [+4413 chars]
